name: Kaytee Clean & Cozy Paper Bedding with Lavender, Made for Small Animals, 24.6 Liters
short_description: ODOR CONTROL for long-lasting freshness. Kaytee Clean & Cozy can be used with any type of habitat for a fresh animal home.
NATURALLY SCENTED with real, pet-safe lavender buds
CRAFTED WITH YOUR PET IN MIND, Kaytee Clean & Cozy 99% dust-free, soft on paws, and gentle on noses.
ABSORBS UP TO 6X TIMES its weight in liquid to maintain a fresh, dry habitat and more absorbent than other types of bedding.
SUPER SOFT PAPER, this premium animal bedding is free of any harmful chemicals or by-products.
THE IDEAL SOLUTION FOR SMALL ANIMALS, including rabbits, guinea pigs, mice, rats, hamsters, gerbils, chinchillas and more.
CAREFULLY CRAFTED IN THE USA & trusted by experts for over 150 years, Kaytee is the small animal champion.
product_description: Create a more tranquil sanctuary both you and your pet will enjoy with Kaytee Clean & Cozy Lavender Bedding. The scent from real lavender buds floats up from every step, helping hide odors and creating a peaceful ambiance every time you visit your furry friend. The lavender buds are safe for your pet and soothing for you. And this is just the beginning of what makes this bedding stand out. Kaytee Clean & Cozy Lavender Bedding uses zero artificial scents and is made from super soft, safe, premium paper. In contrast, some products use an inferior paper by-product known as "sludge." Because we use paper that doesn't contain harmful chemicals or by-products, you can rest easy knowing your pet will be both cozy and safe. Using high-quality paper means our Lavender bedding is highly absorbent — it absorbs six times its weight in liquid and expands to three times its size. Plus, it's easy to scoop and discard. And absorbent bedding gives you peace of mind. Your pet will sleep soundly in comfy bedding that's 99.9% dust free. And our premium, super-absorbent bedding is odor-control guaranteed.

name: carefresh 99% Dust-Free Tutti Frutti Natural Paper Small Pet Bedding with Odor Control, 10 L
short_description: SMALL PET BEDDING: Our cheery and fun Tutti Frutti natural paper fiber bedding makes the softest, driest most comfortable home for small pets

PILLOWY SOFT: Comfyfluff natural paper bedding made from scratch is gentle on sensitive feet with perfect texture for burrowing, tunneling, nesting, or creating a hamster hideout; ideal rat and mice bedding, rabbit litter, guinea pig bedding or for other small pets
EXCEPTIONAL ODOR CONTROL: Our pet-safe, proven odor-control formula suppresses ammonia odors for up to 10 days keeping their home and yours smelling fresh longer
ULTRA-ABSORBENT: 2X more absorbent than shavings, our natural paper bedding keeps small pets and their homes warm and dry with no more soggy messes to clean up

99 PERCENT DUST-FREE: Free of harmful chemicals and synthetic dyes, our high performance bedding is virtually dust free so your pet can enjoy a cleaner, healthier home; Biodegradable and compostable means better for the planet too

Care Instructions Apply 2-6" of bedding to your pet's home. Remove damp spots or soiled areas between changes and replace with fresh bedding. Clean the cage completely once a week, replacing dirty litter and bedding. As with any changes to your pet's care, you should observe your pet closely for changes in behavior. Potential risk of impaction exists if you pet ingests a significant amount of any type of bedding. If you suspect impaction, discontinue use immediately and seek veterinary care.

name: mini&moe Hamster Bedding 50L: Dust-Free and Odor Control Moisture Absorbent Unscented Natural Paper Small Pet Bedding - for Guinea Pigs, Hamsters, Chinchilla,Rabbits,Rat,Ferret, and Gerbil, 50 Liters
short_description: 99.99% Dust-Free, Odorless, and Fragrance-Free – Mini&moe’s small animal bedding is made from virgin wood pulp and dyed with pet-safe food coloring. Through a 3-stage dust screening process, it ensures no dust or harmful odors, providing your pet with clean, fresh air to breathe.

Highly Fluffy and Supportive – Mini&moe’s hamster bedding offers exceptional fluffiness and strong support, making it perfect for burrowing while ensuring excellent breathability. It also provides natural insulation and warmth for your pet.
Superior Absorbency – Mini&moe’s guinea pig bedding has three times the absorbency of regular products. It quickly absorbs moisture without clumping, keeping the bedding loose and dry.
Clean and Safe – Made from pure wood pulp, this small pet bedding is safe for pets to ingest and will not cause intestinal blockages, making it a worry-free choice for your small animals.
Suitable for Various Pets – Ideal for indoor small pets such as hamsters, gerbils, guinea pigs, chinchillas, rabbits, and more.

name: BUCATSTATE Cork Bedding 5L, Natural Hamster Bedding Odor Control for Dwarf Syrian Hamsters, Gerbils, Mice, Low-dust Hamster Substrate with Paper Hideout Box (Grain 2-4mm)
short_description: 【100% Natural 5L Cork Hamster Bedding】This premium hamster bedding is crafted from 100% natural cork log (Grain 2-4mm), providing a chemical-free, eco-friendly habitat. It's a great natural theme enrichment to add to a hamster enclosure.

【Low-Dust Protection for Respiratory Care】The bedding hamster features a protective, low-dust formula that minimizes airborne particles, safeguarding the respiratory health of sensitive small pets and promoting a healthier living environment.

【Stimulates Natural Digging & Nesting Instincts】Designed for hamster enrichment, these cork granules mimic a natural terrain to encourage digging, burrowing, and nesting instincts. Best used in a container or dig box!

【Soft, Rounded Edges for Safety】The hamster textures are specially processed with soft, rounded edges. This hamster substrate is a safer choice, posing no choking or intestinal risk even if chewed, unlike many traditional bedding materials.

【3-in-1 Hamster Enrichment Design】This versatile cork bedding for hamster set includes an assemble-yourself cardboard house, transforming it into a multi-functional hamster enrichment tool that serves as a hideout and a safe chew toy.

Directions How to Use: Scoop out and clean soiled areas daily; add bedding as needed. Empty your pet’s habitat weekly or as needed; replace bedding to keep enclosures clean. Gerbils/Hamsters/Mice (650 sq. in. home): Use 2-5” bedding; 23-30L for low bedding; 50-60L for high bedding. Rats (6 cu. ft. home): Use 2-6” bedding; 23-30L for low bedding; 50-60L for high bedding. Guinea Pigs (10.5 sq ft. home): Use 3-5” bedding; 50-60L for low bedding; 100-120L for high bedding. Chinchillas (12 cu. ft. home): Use 3-4” bedding; 23-30L for low bedding; 50-60L for high bedding. Rabbits (8-12 sq ft. home): Use 3-4” bedding; 50-60L for low bedding; 100-120L for high bedding. Ferrets: Use 6-8” bedding. Puppies: Use 4-6” bedding.

product_description: We believe all small animals should get the care they deserve. Our products are made with only the best materials and are always designed for your pet’s well-being. Kaytee Clean & Cozy White Paper Bedding is incredibly soft to increase pet comfort. Made with premium paper and free of any harmful chemicals or by-products, this bedding provides the coziest of naps. Kaytee bedding is incredibly absorbent, absorbing up to 6x its weight in liquid to maintain a fresh, dry habitat. Pets and pet parents can breathe easy with our 99.9% dust-free, fragrance-free and pet-safe bedding. Kaytee uses premium paper to provide the ultimate comfort since it is super soft and is free from harmful chemicals or by-products. It’s gentle on noses and soft on paws. With every step, your small animal will be cozy, clean, and fresh.

name: mini&moe Rabbit Litter Paper Pellet Bedding: Hamster Bedding Odor Control & Moisture Absorbent Natural Paper Pellet Bedding - for Small Animal Guinea Pigs,Rabbits Bedding 1.98lb
short_description: Made from Virgin Wood Pulp, Dyed with Safe, Edible Colorants – Mini&moe’s paper pellet bedding is crafted from virgin wood pulp and dyed with non-toxic, edible colorants, making it completely safe in case of accidental ingestion.

Low Dust – Through multiple dust-sifting processes, the paper pellet bedding consists of intact particles with no debris, ensuring no dust is released during digging, making it respiratory-friendly for your pets.

3x Better Absorbency – The loose, porous structure of the paper fibers allows for highly efficient moisture absorption. When spread 2-3 cm thick at the bottom of the cage, it effectively absorbs moisture and neutralizes odors, keeping your pet's living space dry and fresh.
Vibrant Colors, Fun and Decorative – With strong support from the paper pellets, you can create layered decorations and 3D spaces, adding fun and variety to your pet’s environment.
Ideal for Small Indoor Pets – Perfect for small indoor pets like hamsters, guinea pigs, chinchillas, hedgehogs, rabbits, and more.
